casebody.data:
ST. JOHN
v.
THOMAS 169P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 13, 2017

Kyle A. Frost, Attorney at Law, Charlotte.

Kathryn E. Hathcock, Assistant Attorney General, for Thomas, Kelly J. (Commissioner of the NC Div. of Motor Vehicles). Laura M. Cobb, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for St. John, Jeffrey Blake.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 13th of July 2017 by Petitioner to Withdraw Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 13th of July 2017."
